评论概述: Cute sweater, but I disliked the heavy buttons
评论详情: This sweater is super soft and adorable on. It fits small. Size up a size. I deducted a star for the heavy, guady buttons. They're problematic and I'm going to replace. The quality could be better. It's a light-weight sweater. Prefect for indoors, but not for cold winter days.

Bought this for my niece and she loves the sweater. My only dislike was how the strawberries was barely glued on and not sewn into the sweater. It was an easy fix for me but maybe not for someone else.
I bought this sweater for my grandkid. She love the design and fit perfectly and cute on her.
The strawberry appliques are attached to the sweater with glue. I've seriously never seen anything like this and am returning the sweater.

Honestly, when I ordered this, my Pinterest boards were dominated with Strawberry Shortcake wallpapers and the remnants of the cottage core craze. After I put this cardigan on, my love for cottage core has only grown. This cardigan is clearly handmade in the best way because it warms you up like a blanket is very stylish! I would recommend this cardigan to anyone who has a similar obsession for strawberries and the softer side of life. The buttons are a little heavy but they stay attached and adorable! Definitely be mindful of how you're washing this cardigan. I suggest washing it by hand or on gentle in the machine with cold water and dry on low to medium heat.
